sections.name: Section A - Multiple Choice Questions
instructions: Attempt all the Questions of this Section
Do not copy down the part questions. Write only the answer against the proper number of the Question and its part according to the question Paper

When the data is pushed in stack, it means the data is:

exit () function is used to:

sections.name: Section B - Short Answer Questions
instructions: Answer any EIGHT questions from this section

questions.question: Differentiate between Constant and Variable.
Explain the purpose of Truth Table.
Differentiate between function declaration and function definition.
Describe the advantages of algorithm.
Write at least three data types in C++. How much memory does each require?
What is meant by Arithmetic assignment operator?
Draw the Truth Table of A.B.C = Y
Remove the error(s) from the following statements (any 3) (i) Court >> "Pakistan" (ii) Age int = 55; (iii) If (a = b) (iv) float x = 13
Why do we use header files?
Explain the Script and Sprite in Scratch.
Write down the purpose of any one from the following: (i) if (ii) goto (iii) cin
Differentiate between queue and stack in data structure.

sections.name: Section C - Detailed Answer Questions
instructions: Attempt any TWO questions from this Section

questions.question: What is an error in computer programming? Describe its types.
Describe any four escape sequence character.
Write down any two purpose and syntax from the following loops: (i) for (ii) while (iii) do-while
Draw the logic circuit of the following Boolean expressions. (i) z = (A + B) + (A + B) (ii) z = (A·B) + (A + B)
Explain non-linear data structure and its types.
Write note on any two of the following: (i) int main ( ) (ii) Pre-define functions (iii) Preprocessor directive (iv) Switch statement
